alert.note: Alert for Chinati Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County; Loving; Marfa Plateau; Reeves County Plains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 02 at 7:11PM CST until January 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Eddy County Plains. In Texas, Loving and Eastern Culberson Counties, Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor, Reeves County Plains, Marfa Plateau and Davis Mountains Foothills, and Chinati Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ Tuesday to midnight CST /11 PM MST/ Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Chinati Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County; Loving; Marfa Plateau; Reeves County Plains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor
